verbs.description: Heavyweight champions past and present [V: have] gathered at the White House , where Donald Trump is set to pardon former boxer Johnson over a century after a miscarriage of justice .

[ARG1: Heavyweight champions] [ARGM-TMP: past and present] have [V: gathered] [ARGM-LOC: at the White House , where Donald Trump is set to pardon former boxer Johnson over a century after a miscarriage of justice] .
Heavyweight champions past and present have gathered at the White House , where Donald Trump [V: is] set to pardon former boxer Johnson over a century after a miscarriage of justice .

Heavyweight champions past and present have gathered at [ARGM-LOC: the White House] , [R-ARGM-LOC: where] [ARG1: Donald Trump] is [V: set] [ARG2: to pardon former boxer Johnson over a century after a miscarriage of justice] .

Heavyweight champions past and present have gathered at the White House , where [ARG0: Donald Trump] is set to [V: pardon] [ARG1: former boxer Johnson] [ARGM-TMP: over a century] [ARGM-TMP: after a miscarriage of justice] .
